resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74202</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74202</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>7e03e413-5edc-442b-a8d5-6cdb13a55092#1#9</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A látás</string>
            <string language="en">The sight</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Anblick</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La vue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A vista</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La vista</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η θέα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La vista</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A szem felépítése és működése - alkalmazkodás a távolsághoz; a fényérzékelés mechanizmusa, a könnyképződés; gyakori látáshibák</string>
            <string language="en">Build and functioning of the eye - accomodation to distance; mechanism of sensation of light, formation of tear; frequent visual defects</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">érzékelés,  érzőműködés,  szem,  fényérzékelés,  </string>
            <string language="en">sensation, sensory functioning, eye, sensation of light</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bau und Arbeiten des Auges - Anpassung an Abstand;
Einheit der Empfindung des Lichtes, Anordnung des Risses; 
häufige Sichtdefekte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Construction et fonctionnement de l'oeil - 
logement à la distance ; mécanisme de sensation de la 
lumière, formation de larme ; défauts visuels fréquents</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Configuração e funcionar do olho - acomodação 
à distância; mecanismo do sensation da luz, formação do 
rasgo; defeitos visuais freqüentes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Configurazione e funzionamento dell'occhio - 
sistemazione alla distanza; meccanismo della sensazione di luce,
formazione della rottura; frequenti difetti visivi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χτίστε και λειτουργία του ματιού - στέγαση στην 
απόσταση  μηχανισμός της αίσθησης του φωτός, σχηματισμός 
του δακρύου  συχνές οπτικές ατέλειες</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura y funcionamiento del ojo - comodidad a 
la distancia; mecanismo de la sensación de la luz, formación 
del rasgón; defectos visuales frecuentes</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Empfindung, sensorisches Arbeiten, Auge, Empfindung des 
Lichtes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sensation, fonctionnement sensoriel, oeil, sensation de 
lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sensation, funcionar sensory, olho, sensation da luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sensazione, funzionamento sensitivo, occhio, sensazione 
di luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αίσθηση, αισθητήρια λειτουργία, μάτι, αίσθηση του φωτός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sensación, funcionamiento sensorial, ojo, sensación de
la luz</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">16-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74202</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=7e03e413-5edc-442b-a8d5-6cdb13a55092&v=1&b=9</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
"
